original_text: But Solomon was building his own house thirteen years, and he finished all his house.
korean_text: 솔로몬이 자기의 왕궁을 십삼 년 동안 건축하여 그 전부를 준공하니라

sentences.original_text: But Solomon was building his own house
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 솔로몬은 자기의 집을 짓고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: and he finished all his house
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 그의 모든 집을 마쳤습니다
